title: String concatenation
comment: Use StringBuilder instead of String concatanation to improve efficiency in larger mazes.

title: Readibility of bitwise operator &
comment: Not all developer are confident with the bitwise operator. Java JIT should be able to optimize the code and transform it in a bitwise operator.

title: source of error in exception
comment: Add the invalid value to the message body of the exception to help debug the code and to help user.

title: Descriptive variable names
comment: Try to refactor the name of the variables to understand better the code. What does the 'n' mean? Nord?
